name: KINGDOM HEARTS 0.2 Birth by Sleep - A fragmentary passage -
name_original: KINGDOM HEARTS 0.2 Birth by Sleep - A fragmentary passage -
description:
KINGDOM HEARTS 0.2 Birth by Sleep - A fragmentary passage - is an action-RPG game developed by Square Enix. It came out on 12-01-2017. Square Enix published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
KINGDOM HEARTS 0.2 Birth by Sleep - A fragmentary passage - is available on PlayStation 4.
